EDUCATION.Institute Name: Indian Institute of Engineering Science & Technology, Shibpur

PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: Establishing a network of swarm intelligent minibots which is guided by a Quadcopter to achieve tasks such as moving an object from one position to another.
Developed a vision guided bot that worked on the basis of Augmented Display and hosted a Computer Vision based Robotics Event ESCAPIST in Instruo’15 (IIEST Shibpur).

Developed a vision guided bot which could solve the game in the Computer Vision based Robotics Event AUGHIT in Kshitij 2015 (IIT KGP).
Secured the 3 rd position in the same.

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Logo Spotting using Bag of Words Model
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
Developed two bag of words models (one using SIFT and another using ShapeContext) to identify company logos on scanned documents.
Under Prof. Sekhar Mondal, CST Dept, IIEST Shibpur

Developed an OCR using OpenCV(C++) which could identify digits and binary operators for the Computer Vision based Robotics Event SHELDON in Kshitij 2016 (IIT KGP). Secured the 1 st position in the same.

Developed web module & database structure for the examination department using ASP.NET (based on IIESTS)
Under Prof. Sekhar Mondal, CST Dept, IIEST Shibpur
Developed a vision guided bot that could play the game Konnect4 and hosted a Computer Vision based Robotics Event Konnect4 in Instruo’16 (IIEST Shibpur).

Understanding the basic principles and implementing them.
Under Prof. Sekhar Mondal, CST Dept, IIEST Shibpur

Developed a vision guided bot which could follow another bot like a shadow for the Computer Vision based Robotics Event SHADOW in Instruo’14 (IIEST Shibpur).
Secured the 1 st position in the same.
Developed and managed http://www.robodarshan.in and http://codeiiest.iiests.ac.in from scratch.
